about_the_game: The original soundtrack of Pioneers of Pagonia features 13 tracks of atmospheric music including the uplifting medieval tunes you hear while building up your village and the signature Pagonian themes from our in-game and Early Access release trailer. The soundtrack is composed by Alexander Röder.
detailed_description: The original soundtrack of Pioneers of Pagonia features 13 tracks of atmospheric music including the uplifting medieval tunes you hear while building up your village and the signature Pagonian themes from our in-game and Early Access release trailer. The soundtrack is composed by Alexander Röder.

short_description: This product contains the original soundtrack of the city builder game Pioneers of Pagonia, including uplifting medieval and atmospheric music. The soundtrack is composed and produced by Dynamedion.
